subject: Reaches entrusted to NHAI by MoRTH - Traffic Surveys using portable ATCC systems by the agencies of IHMCL- Amendment to the Policy Circular dated 11.3.2015

New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/218/2007-Admn Dated: 15.04.2015 Policy Matters: Technical (176/2015) (Decision _taken on FileNo_NHAU/13028/03/2013-HAMof HAM Division) Sub:: Reaches entrusted to NHAI by MORTH Traffic Surveys using portable ATCC systems by the agencies of IHMCL; Amendment to the Policy Circular dated 11.03.2015. With the approval of the Competent Authority, Para-4 of Policy  Circular [Technical) (175/2015)] dated 11.03.2015 is replaced with new Para-4 as under: 4_ In connection with traffic surveys by the agencies of IHMCL on the stretches of NHs with NHAI, the following may please be ensured: ROs and PDs may provide all necessary facilitation and assistance in conducting the traffic surveys smoothly: (ii) In Policy Circular dated 11.03.2015, ROs had already been asked to quickly review the locations of traffic surveys under their respective jurisdictions; undertake minor adjustments to the locations (if any) duly maintaining overall objectives and inform the final locations within 15 days from the Circular dated 11.03.2015. As this review should have been completed by this time, ROs shall confirm immediately to IHMCL (e-mail ID rcpalekar@nhai org) and HAM Division of NHAI (e-mail ID hemamalini@nhai org), the final locations under their respective jurisdictions. (iii) Keeping in view the requirements of NHAI viz (i) calculation of APCs/ revised remittances at the Toll Plazas of NHAI; (ii) ascertain actual traffic VS target traffic for modifications in the concession period, traffic sampling, revenue shortfall etc under DBFOT(Toll) Projects etc; ROs shall give a list of traffic survey locations, which need to be taken up for traffic surveys on priority basis, atleast one month in advance giving all details to IHMCL (e-mail ID rcpalekar@nhaiorg) and HAM Division of NHAI (e-mail ID hemamalini@nhai org) 4 (V.K.
